description: Bluetooth version 3.0, 2.1 channel, 2Way 3speaker systerm with front firing subwoofer.  Bluetooth 3.0 provides easy paring and at least 50 foot connectivity range.  Built in rechargeable 10-Hour Lithium Ion battery.  Hands free phone function and touch sensitive top controls.  Recharges both Apple and Samsung Galaxy mobile devices while playing wirelessly.  3.5mm stereo AUX input connector.  Amethyst Innovations takes seriously consumer protection and provides a hassle-free 1yr replacement warranty unforeseen defective products by telephoning customer service at 714-731-2921 ext.2.
title: Amethyst Innovations M175GR Portable Bluetooth Speaker, Gray
